description_text:
Hi,

I placed an order for the Plus X pedals 9 days ago, but I see it has not
yet shipped. Could you please provide an update on its status?

Order #: SSN2837

conversations.body_text: Hi Hampus Hjortsberg,    To avoid customs duties, we shall dispatch your order today following replenishment at our German warehouse.
